alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pender, southeastern Bladen, north central Brunswick and northeastern Columbus Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carvers, or 15 miles southeast of Elizabethtown, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Rowan, Lake Waccamaw, Northwest, Sandyfield, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Hallsboro, Long Creek, Redbug, Ashton, Council, Rocky Point, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, Riegelwood, White Stocking, Carvers, and Honey Island. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 389 and 408. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for southeastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender
